dataaccesslayer

Class GradeDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataaccesslayer.GradeDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GradeDao

    public class GradeDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GradeDao
    Implements the GradeDao interface and provides access to the grade data source. Assignment 2 Class: CST8288 - Lab Section: 013 Lab Professor: Siju Philip Date: Mar. 30, 2023

      • getGradeByStudentIdCourseCode

        public GradeDTO getGradeByStudentIdCourseCode(int studentId,
                                              java.lang.String courseCode)
        Retrieves a GradeDTO object from the database by student ID and course code.
        Specified by:
        getGradeByStudentIdCourseCode in interface GradeDao
        Parameters:
        studentId - the ID of the student whose grade is being retrieved.
        courseCode - the code of the course for which the grade is being retrieved.
        Returns:
        a GradeDTO object for the specified student and course, or null if no grade was found.
